    October CMS Theme

    Documentation

    Get Started →

    October CMS

    Modern CMS System for sophisticated people and their modern life. Based on laravel and using twig for templating, modular for rapid web development.

    Cards Theme

    Modular Theme / Template for October CMS. Build with UIKit v3 Version 3.0.3 - Extended settings menu as static pages settings to improve the user experience.

    UIKit 3

    A lightweight and modular front-end framework for developing fast and powerful web interfaces - Freedom for frontend designers.
